duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide responsive and proactive support to clients and patients using voice, video, email, and chat communications.
Troubleshoot and resolve software, hardware, and services related issues for clients and patients seeking technical assistance.
Become a subject matter expert on company products (hardware, software, services) and work closely with the Product team to advocate for customer needs and feature enhancements.
Collaborate with Client Strategy and Data Science teams to set up clinical dashboards and reports for clients.
Establish and build relationships with clinical teams, digital transformation leaders, and patients to ensure high customer satisfaction.
Deliver efficient customer experiences using internal tools such as CRM, ticketing, reporting, and chat tools.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a technical or business discipline and/or experience in technical support in a fast-moving SaaS company
